title: Luminary Tour: Floating Museum (October 11)
title_display: Luminary Tour: Floating Museum: A Lion for Every House
hero_caption: An installation view of Floating Museum: A Lion for Every House at the Art Institute of Chicago, 2022
short_description:
On this guided small-group tour, join fellow Luminary to explore the new site-specific installation of Floating Museum: A Lion for Every House.

Open exclusively to Luminary members, this tour requires advance registration and is limited to 12 participants. The tour lasts approximately 50 minutes.
list_description: On this guided small-group tour, join fellow Luminary to explore the new site-specific installation of Floating Museum: A Lion for Every House.
description:
Discover how the Chicago art collective Floating Museum uses art to explore relationships among community, architecture, and public institutions. On this guided small-group tour, Luminary will discuss the new site-specific installation of Floating Museum: A Lion for Every House.

Open exclusively to Luminary members, this tour requires advance registration and is limited to 12 participants. The tour lasts approximately 50 minutes.

So that you can enjoy your experience safely, all museum visiting policies at the time of the event must be observed.

Contact Us

If you have questions or are interested in learning more about Luminary membership, we’d be delighted to hear from you. Please contact us at (312) 443-3735 or luminary@artic.edu.
buy_button_caption:
$50 per person
This tour is limited to 12 participants.
